item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: S1m0ne sucked. Hollywood is fake, plastic, naive, and more than a little stupid, so when Hollywood tries to expose itself, you get a plastic story filled with naive characters and lots of stupidity. But don't despair, you still get the obligatory rekindled relationship happiness and the "Who am I and what is life about?" drivel that Hollywood thinks pass for meaning. And what was Al Pacino thinking?
